title: Births, deaths, and other vital events
description: Births, Deaths and Other Vital Events - Quarterly Figures for Scotland.
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll down to latest release under heading "Births, Deaths and Other Vital Events - Quarterly Figures 2019". This will open a new page with a link to the dataset half way down the page under "All Tables and Figures".
sizingNotes: Largish tables but simple structures. Footnotes present, multiple dimensions and sub-dimensions.
